title: Nuwara Eliya Tea Country

itinerary.title: Tea Plantation Tour
itinerary.description: Visit working tea estates, learn about tea processing, and enjoy high-quality Ceylon tea.

itinerary.title: Gregory Lake & Victoria Park
itinerary.description: Boat ride on Gregory Lake and stroll through Victoria Park with its colonial charm.

itinerary.title: Horton Plains & World's End
itinerary.description: Early morning trek to Horton Plains National Park and the famous World's End viewpoint.

description: Experience Sri Lanka's 'Little England' with cool climate, tea plantations, and stunning highland scenery.
